Details: Super has cheated me out of $900!  This site is a scam.  The hotel never received the reservation.  I wasted probably 20 phone calls to support and several hours at the hotel before finally having to book at rack rate.  Now they will not refund my money, despite providing written confirmation that the hotel did not have my booking.  Avoid at all costs!
Found best price for hotel in ******. I found it easy to navigate and clear information about what I was committing to. Will use again

SCAM!!!! PAID $279 FOR HOTEL BOOKING. DID NOT PAY HOTEL AND HAD TO COME OUT OF POCKET AGAIN! COMPANY THROUGH EMAIL SAID A REFUND WOULD BE ISSUED AND NOTHING HAS HAPPENED!THEY SAY THEY WILLCALL BACK WHEN ******** ON PHONE, CHAT AND EMAIL. NEVER A FOLLOW UP ID RECEIVED!

I used this app to book a room that I researched and decided on.  The app booked an entirely different room and in a different location from where I planned to stay. I immediately notified Supertravel of the app error. I was told the room was non refundable but a one time exception could be made if I contacted the hotel and they agreed to cancel the room.  The hotel was very helpful and said they hear from customers that these things happen a lot.  I emailed Super travel with the requested document attached. After several attempts and speaking to various chat bots and agents, ***** has been less than helpful in resolving the matter after several attempts. I continue to get the same response from every agent but no resolution in my sought refund. This is a company that seems more concerned with keeping customers money than customer satisfaction. Is that why they changed their name from Snaptravel to Supertravel? Anyone else have this problem? Maybe a class action suit awaits.
As advertised,  the lowest rate at a 4 star hotel. Everything went great.
They took money up front but never paid the hotel. Super and hotel both charged fully. I requested a refund but super never helpful.
Hotel reimbursed me for mistaken reservation. They reimbursed Super.com and they were to reimburse me. Super.com kept the money!! SCAM
I was refunded from the initial hotel But, super.com kept the money. And told me it was a nonrefundable transaction.

Don't waste your time with this guys, they take your money and when you get to the hotel they tell you they don't know super and you lose your money, my reservation number was B_11588925, and they just scam people dont use them

I experience was good. I didn't have to cancel or anything so nothing really happened. Everything was fine with hotel the only thing I was confused about was after paying in full thru super.com I still had to pay like $75. For the room.

This is not a reputable company, I was tricked into purchasing a ticket and was told by the salesperson that I would be able to redeem a conference discount at the counter upon checkin. That was a lie, when I checked in at the hotel, they told me I would not be able to redeem a conference discount since it was a 3rd party booking.

Will never book with them again. Booked 2 hotels with them. Both nonrefundable which I hate. Well when we checked Into 1 hotel, there was blood stains on the bed sheets. We grabbed all our stuff and went back to the car. We weren't staying at that hotel period. Hotel said to tell super everything and to contact them and they will tell super to refund us. My boyfriend called super and they told him to contact the hotel and email all the info explaining first then they will refund him. That's pure BS. He's shouldn't have to do that, super should get a hold of the hotel themselves if they want all the info. The hotel is giving my boyfriend a hard time as he is trying to get a hold of a manager to speak to to send super all the info. Shouldn't be this difficult. Should already have been refunded by now. After this will never book with super again.
I was a little worried when I read the reviews but I booked with them they were way cheaper than anyone else and it was a great experience will book with them again.

This company preys on the elderly.  I used their service to book a room for what I thought was tomorrow a Monday the23rd of October.  Unfortunately when you go to their site to book room it  automatically brings up the date for the following Monday which is the 30th.  I only saw that it was a Monday when booking. I realized my mistake almost immediately.  I contacted them immediately told them I would pay whatever extra might but I needed a room for tomorrow not the next week.  They of course said they could do nothing and that I should have been more aware.  This company preys on elderly people who dont have the computer skills and knowledge that most have.  I know this happens often.  Putting in a date is deceiving they should have the consumer put in date for reservations.  Please dont ever do business with a company like this.

I made my hotel reservation on their website which I thought was the hotel website. When I got to the hotel they said my reservation had been cancelled. I didnt cancel it. The hotel said they do not accept third party reservations so I had to book my hotel room and pay for it again. Reservation stays said they would refund my money if I sent them my receipt from the hotel, which I did. They then refused to give me my refund because only my name appears on the reservation, not my husbands. That is ***** because I made the reservation. They just didnt want to pay. Do not use this company!!! They are a scam.
Dishonest.  Hotels should drop them as a booking agent.Imitated hotels website.  They booked me in ************ instead of ** and refused a refund.
This reservation was great and cheaper than the other sites.  The location I stayed at was great.

Booked a hotel thru them for a night. Confirmation no. Of the booking was B_11477483. I was allotted a room for in which shower didnt work at all. I talked to manager and showed him the video of the same. He agreed to fully refund the money. However, he requested to claim through reservation site.  He has included  comments against my reservation - refund fully. I am chasing up the support from last 10 days. They asked me to get hotel to send me email which also hotel did as they said they do not have facility to call outside. However, when you call support, you have an option for them to call you back. But now they wont refund and cant get thru their support service.

I used Super.com last month, and saved about 30% (hotel website $142+tax; Super.com $110+Tax). I picked my hotel that I knew was decent. Super had no hand in booking (so, when people complain that they got a bad hotel, they do not have any standing). The booking confirmation clearly says No Cancelations. So if you are 100% sure, then only use Super.com All in all, this site provides valuable service post-COVID since it appears hotel chains have gone crazy with their prices the last year or so!

Completely fraudulant. Imitated hotel's website.  Rushed me and caused confusion to secure the booking and overcharged.  Won't refund.

I book in the future and I will recommend it to anybody I know thank you and I appreciate Being able to save that much money because the hotel spiked to the prices for that weekend just weeks before my stay, a normal rate went for $150 per night this weekend they spiked up to nearly $400 per night I only paid $287 per night because of super.com thank you again I cant thank you enough.

I received a standard room on a higher floor (not a run-of-house room, which are often undesirable and assigned to discount rates). I recommend SuperTravel and will definitely use this service for future travel needs.

I recently had the pleasure of using SuperTravel, a web page for booking hotels, and I must say that my experience exceeded all expectations. In particular, I was highly impressed with their engaging follow-up system and automated reminders, as well as the incredible affordability they offered compared to other platforms.At first, I must admit that I was skeptical about using SuperTravel. With so many options available online, it's natural to approach new platforms with caution. However, I am delighted to say that SuperTravel completely won me over.One of the standout features of SuperTravel is their exceptional follow-up system. From the moment I booked my hotel, I received regular updates and reminders about my reservation. The platform kept me informed about any changes or updates, ensuring that I felt well taken care of throughout the process. This level of attention and communication truly set SuperTravel apart from its competitors.Additionally, the automated reminders provided by SuperTravel were incredibly helpful. With our busy lives, it's easy to forget important details, but SuperTravel's system made sure that didn't happen. I received timely reminders about my upcoming stay, ensuring that I was well-prepared and organized.One of the most impressive aspects of SuperTravel was the affordability they offered. As someone who always looks for the best value, I was pleasantly surprised to find that SuperTravel consistently provided the cheapest hotel options compared to other booking platforms.When my family and I arrived at the hotel, we were thrilled with the outcome. The stay was truly exceptional, and our ocean view room was simply breathtaking. The hotel lived up to our expectations, offering top-notch amenities, excellent service, and a stunning location. Our experience with SuperTravel ensured that our family vacation was memorable and enjoyable for everyone.
Great service to make your reservation quicker , and much less pricing option than other providers !
Very reliable and quick service. Highly recommended to book through Super Travel.

BEWARE. I made my reservation through them (I thought I was reserving through the hotel's website - ****** learned) and they charged the full amount my credit card.  When I arrived at my hotel, the reservation was there - BUT THEY HAD NOT PAID THE ****** so I had to pay the hotel at check-in (to add salt to the wound, the actual hotel bill was $477, and reservation stays charged me $692).I made my reservation on April 3rd.  This company did not actually call the hotel to make the reservation until May 22nd (they are lucky a room was still available), but the credit card they gave the hotel was declined - a VERY bad sign for a "big name" reservation company, and leaving me on the hook for the room while they pocketed the $692 I had paid them.I ended up filing a chargeback with my credit card and was told I would only be refunded the $477 - leaving reservations Stays with a nice $220 profit for causing me a HUGE hassle.

I googled the hotel I wanted to stay in and Super Travel came up with the best rate. So I used them and had no trouble at all.

Beware when booking a hotel with reservation stays:  it is a scam.  It appeared that I was making a reservation on the hotels actual website.  I prepaid and paid extra for cancellation insurance.  I called 3 days in advance of the reservation start date to cancel, and they referred me to a form to fill out.  The form required me to provide a medical excuse for the cancellation and a pdf of my reservation.  I spoke with someone on the phone who said they could not help me because I did not upload my medical info (reason for cancelling) to their form.  I explained about the ***** law and the representative said he could not help me if I did not provide everything requested on the form.I called the hotel directly to let them know I would not need the reservation and to let them know it appeared I was making the reservation directly on their site.  The response was that there was nothing they could do because they could not control 3rd parties.
Our experience was a very easy straight forward booking process!
Love SuperTravel! They got me the cheapest possible rate for a very nice hotel. Very happy with them!

I had a very positive experience, although it started out uncertain. Hotel told me there was no res, I had booked for the wrong date. I went back to SuperTravel and for some reason it auto set to the next month. There was still room at the hotel, ST still had the best price so I booked again through them (after I checked the first res I made and it said refundable until June 13). I made the new res, it was about $40 less than the hotel front desk and I was told breakfast for two was included, which I didn't remember seeing. I was alone, but my friend was able to have the breakfast. Then I got home and clicked through, expecting a difficult time, but it wasn't. Just that the link to cancel the distant res was far down the page. They let me know the refund may take 3-5 days, but I paid with PayPal and I got a notice a couple hours later that a refund was in process. I was pleasantly surprised!
I've used supertravel numerous times and they've always saved me money!

Needed a literal last minute room in BFE ********. Googled it and Super came up with the least expensive rate by far, like 60% under standard rate. Super easy UI, immediately booked upon payment, seemless at the hotel. Then they sent a coupon for like 30 bucks off if I needed to extend.  I didn't need it, but it was a nice touch.  I'd sum up Super as a fast, convenient, value-added service. 5/5

Beware. They will lie to get you to book. I specifically asked if the hotel I was booking had long term parking for leaving our car while on vacation. I was told there was parking and all I needed to do was ask at check in. Upon checking in I was told there is no long term parking through the hotel and that reservation stays is aware and keeps telling people that anyway. Absolutely unprofessional. We chose this hotel for the parking and shuttle which is no useless and have had to spend another $200 on parking elsewhere.

This was my first time booking with SuperTravel, but I have no complaints! We booked a nice resort, and actually ended up somehow getting upgraded to a better accommodation than what I originally booked at no extra cost, so that was exciting! Everything went well and we would do it again!

This would be the second time I have used super travel to book a hotel at the Hampton ************ meadowlands ********** site and both times making the reservation were way more simple than most other sites and the price was guaranteed which was the lowest price I found both times and my stay at both places was absolutely wonderful The staff and everything was great I would definitely recommend supertravel to anyone I know
Great ServiceSuperTravel is definitely worth the ************ in booking a hotel!
Fast and easy booking  Found the right hotel at a great price! Highly recommend.
Will use again. Fast. Efficient. The price was great and was charged what was agreed.
Fantastic business. They give a personal touch like a local travel agency would, without the hassle.
Rates were as advertised and no problem at check in. Will definitely be using this service again

Excellent service, the price I paid is really attractive, when I arrived at the hotel, everything was fine, after checking my credit card charges, the price is as indicated, I will definitely use the service again.

I agree with other reviewers. DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE. Total scam. I am usually very careful but they tricked me into thinking I was at the hotel site when I searched for it. I have read several other bad reviews who report the same thing. I paid extra for non refundable hotel stay and they make it near impossible to cancel and then get the refund. You wait forever for the service number and then when you get through they say we cannot take refund request on line, use the "link" to submit the form. The link does not work and makes no sense. I plan to report this business to any regulatory agency that will listen.  Date of experience: May 10, 2023
Clean, nice part of *****, quiet, lovely breakfast and even offered a simple supper. Pool and exercise room as well as pet friendly. Definitely staying there again.
The price that I paid is really attractive. When I arrived at the hotel, everything was smooth. After checking my credit card charges, the price is as stated. I will definitely use the service again.

I will do all my business with this company. I return some items and within a little over a week my refund was deposited back into my credit card. This is the fastest that I have ever gotten my money back. This is a great company.
